headline: Algonquin Power & Utilities Corp. Appoints Peter Norgeot as Chief Operating Officer
summary: OAKVILLE, Ontario, January 05, 2026--Algonquin Power & Utilities Corp. (TSX/NYSE: AQN) ("AQN", "Algonquin" or the "Company") today announced the appointment of Peter Norgeot as Chief Operating Officer (COO), effective immediately. Mr. Norgeot joins Algonquin after having recently retired as COO from Entergy Corporation (NYSE: ETR) ("Entergy") and will be responsible for leading the Company’s electric, gas, and water regulated utility operations, capital execution, and enterprise-wide operational

content.title: Algonquin Power & Utilities Corp. Appoints Peter Norgeot as Chief Operating Officer
content.summary: OAKVILLE, Ontario, January 05, 2026--Algonquin Power & Utilities Corp. (TSX/NYSE: AQN) ("AQN", "Algonquin" or the "Company") today announced the appointment of Peter Norgeot as Chief Operating Officer (COO), effective immediately. Mr. Norgeot joins Algonquin after having recently retired as COO from Entergy Corporation (NYSE: ETR) ("Entergy") and will be responsible for leading the Company’s electric, gas, and water regulated utility operations, capital execution, and enterprise-wide operational
